hero.title: Professional Network Acceleration Service
hero.description: High-speed and stable global network access solution, providing secure, reliable and convenient network acceleration experience

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.description: We provide the most professional network acceleration services to take your network experience to the next level

highSpeed.title: Lightning Fast
highSpeed.desc: Advanced acceleration technology for ultra-fast network connection speeds

security.title: Secure
security.desc: Enterprise-level encryption technology to ensure your network data transmission security

global.title: Global Coverage
global.desc: Server nodes worldwide for nearby access to get the best experience

reliable.title: Reliable
reliable.desc: 99.9% service availability, enjoy the network anytime, anywhere

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.desc: One-click connection, multi-platform support, easy to get started without technical background

support.title: Professional Support
support.desc: 7√ó24 hours customer service, ready to solve usage problems for you

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Flexible pricing strategy to meet different user needs

testimonials.title: User Reviews
testimonials.description: See how other users rate our services
testimonials.comment1: This is the best network acceleration service I've used. Fast speed, strong stability, and timely customer service response.
testimonials.comment2: Simple and easy-to-use interface, fast connection speed, reasonable price, highly recommended to everyone.
testimonials.comment3: Professional technical team, high-quality service quality, greatly improved my work efficiency.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Register now and enjoy professional network acceleration services

store.title: Store
store.selectPlanToViewOptions: Please select a plan to view options
store.dataLoading: Data loading failed, please check network connection or contact administrator
store.pendingOrderDesc: You have unpaid orders and cannot create new orders!
store.handleMethodDesc: You can choose to pay for existing orders or cancel existing orders and purchase new plans.
store.cancelOrderWarning: Orders cannot be recovered after cancellation. Are you sure you want to cancel?
store.purchaseError: Purchase failed, please try again later
store.welcome: Thank you for choosing our service. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.
store.payAsYouGoDesc: Charge based on actual traffic usage, pay as you use
store.packageTrafficDesc: Package traffic, speed limited after exceeding
store.payAsYouGoNoticeDetails: Pay As You Go Plan Details
store.payAsYouGoDescriptionText: Pay-as-you-go is a one-time purchase plan with permanent traffic validity, effective immediately after purchase.
store.trafficValidityText: Pay-as-you-go plan traffic is permanently valid, never expires, and can be used gradually until exhausted.
store.usageCalculationText: System charges based on actual upload + download traffic usage, unused traffic will not be deducted.
store.purchaseAdviceText: Suitable for users with irregular traffic usage, flexible usage based on actual needs without worrying about traffic expiration.
store.effectiveTimingText: Takes effect immediately after purchase, no waiting required, services and nodes can be used right away.
store.aboutUsageText: Suitable for light and occasional usage (such as: browsing news, materials, downloading software, communicating with international clients) or trial users.
store.aboutNodesText: Pay-as-you-go can use all nodes without device limitations or peak restrictions!
store.aboutExpiryText: No expiry time, stops when traffic is exhausted, cost-effective product, no discounts, traffic doesn't stack.
store.payAsYouGoNoticeText: Pay-as-you-go plans are one-time purchases with permanent traffic validity, effective immediately after purchase.
store.defaultPurchaseNotice: The plan will take effect immediately after purchase, please confirm your selection.
store.orderCancelWarningQuestion: Are you sure you want to cancel the following order?
store.orderCannotRecover: Note: Cannot be recovered after cancellation, you need to recreate order.
store.pleaseSubscribePlanFirst: Please subscribe to a plan first before purchasing traffic reset package
store.planNotSupportTrafficReset: Current plan does not support traffic reset package
store.extendPlanAfterPurchase: Plan validity will be extended after purchase
store.effectImmediatelyNotice: Will take effect immediately after confirmation, please carefully review plan information
store.renewalDescription: Renewing plan during validity period only extends duration without resetting traffic. Check dashboard for reset time or pay for reset.
store.resetTrafficDescription: When traffic exceeds 80% during validity period, dashboard will show popup. Click reset traffic when traffic is exhausted.
store.changePlanDescription: Purchasing different plan during validity period will overwrite current plan, please purchase carefully.
store.planDescriptionText: Monthly plans can select the most suitable time period according to needs, system will automatically calculate monthly traffic quota!
store.trafficReminderText: System will deduct corresponding plan 'traffic' or 'quota' amount according to 'monthly plan' pay-per-use billing mode.
store.effectiveReminderText: Different methods correspond to different system 1-3 minutes to take effect, monthly plan general async deduction card will not deduct full amount.
